title: Diary of a Madman and Other Stories
description: Illuminates the Russian writer's thoughts on madness, bureaucracy, and illusion in these five tales.Stories:1. Diary of a Madman2. The Nose3. The Overcoat4. How Ivanocich Quarrelled with Ivan Nikiforovich5. Ivan Fyodorovich Shponka and His Aunt
author: Nikolai Gogol
